events.message: Customer reported an auto accident involving their vehicle on a busy intersection last night causing visible damages to the front bumper.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and verifying keywords related to car collision.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle this auto accident claim and to communicate with the customer for further processing.
Customer was contacted and the claim acknowledgement was confirmed with positive feedback about the quick response from the agent.
Requested customer to submit photos of the car damage along with the police report and insurance policy for verification.
Customer promptly submitted all required documents including accident photos and official police collision report, facilitating review.
The insurance team began investigating the auto accident details to assess liability and the extent of vehicle damage.
Investigation concluded with confirmation that the accident was caused by a third party driver, with moderate vehicle damages.
A fair settlement amount was proposed to the customer covering the repair costs for the vehicle damage plus applicable fees.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the settlement offer and appreciated the transparency throughout the claim process.
The claim was formally approved after customer acceptance of the settlement, enabling the financial disbursement to proceed.
Insurance payment issued to the customerâ€™s account covering the cost of repairs as per the approved settlement agreement.
The auto accident claim was successfully closed with all obligations met and customer feedback indicating a positive experience.
